metadata.name: ESSENCE01
metadata.description:
Collection: "ESSENCE"
NFT 1/1 Edition

Technique: micron 04 drawliner, fabriano paper
Size: 13x18.3 cm

The works presented in this collection were each made under a specific music track. Track as a code, the vibration of the code is the work itself, an attempt to capture the music, rhythm, feeling, depth, through the intangible (which helps to do the technique of dots) but at the same time what can hit a person, touch his heart, each work with a description of the track under which the work was made and the feelings, thoughts of the author.

The work is made under the repeating track: 
RY X - "ONLY"

love, solitude, solitude, inner strength, beauty, air, lightness, falling in love, revelation
